desc: Home to Madagascan raffia for waterfowl hunters, crafters, florists, theaters and many more. Raffia is an organic, all-natural palm fiber. Raffia can be used as hunting grass, package filler, for gift wrapping, decorating and more. We also sell raffia mats for display purposes and to production studios.

layout.text: THE BEST FOR YOUR HUNTING NEEDS & BEYOND
Our mission is to provide the world with an organic and renewable plant that can be used recreationally.
